thread.title: Hazel Hooton
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Hazel Hooton

author: Hazel Hooton
title: Hazel Hooton
text: This was a fantastic experience where my car was collected at 8:15am and returned to me at 3:15pm. I received a call to say my car had passed it's MOT with no problems and was told of some minor issues that should be looked at but not urgently. Both drivers were courteous and respectful and the whole experience was absolutely great with no hassle. I will use this service again in 2018 if it becomes available.
